bibl.title: The Fayum in the Description de l'Égypte.
bibl.note: Illustrates some of the ways, in which the Description de l'Égypte can help us to understand what we find in our papyrological texts: P. Cairo Zenon III, 59430; P. Count 2 + 3. - Pp. 170-171: Appendix. Contributions in the Description de l'Égypte of most relevance to the Fayum.

bibl.title: Von der Pharaonenzeit bis zur Spätantike. Kulturelle Vielfalt im Fayum. Akten der 5. Internationalen Fayum-Konferenz, 29. Mai bis 1. Juni 2013, Leipzig.

bibl.seg: 145.12 / 145.4 P. Count 2 + 3 145.4 P. Cairo Zenon III, 59430
Dorothy J. Thompson, The Fayum in the Description de l'Égypte.

Nadine Quenouille (ed.), Von der Pharaonenzeit bis zur Spätantike. Kulturelle Vielfalt im Fayum. Akten der 5. Internationalen Fayum-Konferenz, 29. Mai bis 1. Juni 2013, Leipzig (Wiesbaden, 2015) pp. 163-171, 1 tabl., 2 diagrammes.

Illustrates some of the ways, in which the Description de l'Égypte can help us to understand what we find in our papyrological texts: P. Cairo Zenon III, 59430; P. Count 2 + 3. - Pp. 170-171: Appendix. Contributions in the Description de l'Égypte of most relevance to the Fayum.
